name: Appili Therapeutics Inc.
longDescription: Appili Therapeutics Inc. is a biopharmaceutical company. The company is engaged in novel antibiotic and anti-infective therapies to help patients suffering from serious infections. Its anti-infective portfolio currently includes major programs namely ATI-1701, ATI-1801 and ATI-1501.

Its anti-infective portfolio currently includes major programs namely ATI-1701, ATI-1801 and ATI-1501.
fullAddress: No. 21-1344 Summer Street,Suite 415, Halifax, NS, CA
